210th Year of the Fifth Cycle, July 3

I grow weary of the lack of progress I have been able to make. The more
I think of it, the more I know my accursed brother would know exactly
how to deal with this issue, and generate further enchantments from the
phenomenon I have observed. I must find a way to bring him here! I have
dispatched spies to Shalewood to discover what can be known.
